alert.note: Alert for North Cass; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:18AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Itasca, northwestern Aitkin, Cass and Crow Wing Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 917 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Poplar, to 8 miles west of Pequot Lakes, to near Upper South Long Lake, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pine River and Cuyuna around 925 AM CDT. Backus around 930 AM CDT. Hackensack around 935 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Walker, Wabedo, Longville, Woman Lake, Boy River, Swatara and Leech Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; South Cass; South Itasca
